introduction: My name is Aleksander Fret and I'm Front-End Developer. Currently I'm focused on techologies: JavaScript, React, Redux, CSS, SASS and HTML. Ocasionally I use also back-end tools (PHP, MySQL). Moreover I'm Graphic Designer (Adobe, Corel) and Cartographer. When I have free time, I split it between various hobbies: web technologies, playing the guitar, listening to the music, board games (i.a. developing my own version of Talisman), mountain trips. And what brings you here? I invite you to contact and cooperation
